test_output_summary: All 89 unit tests passed (54 project_id tests + 35 group_prefixing tests), 2 integration tests skipped (require Neo4j). Integration test suite created with 16 test classes covering multi-project isolation, system knowledge sharing, cross-project search, configuration methods, edge cases, and performance.
implementation_notes:
Task TASK-GR-PRE-001-D requested comprehensive tests and documentation for project namespace foundation (PRE-001-A, PRE-001-B, PRE-001-C). Upon investigation, discovered that all unit tests were already implemented and passing in previous tasks:

1. **Existing Tests (Already Complete)**:
   - tests/knowledge/test_graphiti_client_project_id.py (54 tests, 100% passing)
   - tests/knowledge/test_graphiti_group_prefixing.py (37 tests, 100% passing including 2 skipped integration tests)
   - Total: 91 tests covering all acceptance criteria

2. **New Work Completed**:
   - Created comprehensive documentation: docs/guides/graphiti-project-namespaces.md (25KB guide)
   - Updated existing guide: docs/guides/graphiti-integration-guide.md (added multi-project support section)
   - Created integration test suite: tests/integration/graphiti/test_multi_project_namespace.py (16 test classes)

3. **Documentation Coverage**:
   - Problem statement and use cases
   - Quick start with auto-detection
   - Core concepts (project ID format, group ID prefixing, configuration priority)
   - Configuration methods (auto-detect, YAML, env vars, programmatic)
   - Working with namespaces (adding knowledge, searching, preventing double-prefixing)
   - Best practices (6 recommendations)
   - FAQ (9 common questions)
   - Implementation reference

4. **Integration Test Coverage**:
   - Multi-project isolation (4 tests)
   - System knowledge sharing (2 tests)
   - Cross-project search (2 tests)
   - Configuration methods (3 tests)
   - Edge cases (4 tests)
   - Performance benchmarks (1 test)

All acceptance criteria were already met by existing tests, so this task focused on documentation and integration testing.
requirements_addressed: Unit tests for project ID detection and validation (54 tests already exist)
Unit tests for group ID prefixing (35 tests already exist)
Unit tests for project initialization (included in 54 project_id tests)
Integration tests for multi-project scenarios (16 new test classes created)
Documentation for project namespace configuration (comprehensive 25KB guide created)
Update Graphiti getting started guide (section added to graphiti-integration-guide.md)
